fields.description: As a cloudformation user, I would like to be able to create nested stacks.

comments.body:
I also tried using a lowercase stack name.  Same error was displayed:
{code}
$ aws --endpoint-url http://cloudformation.h-12.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com:8773/ cloudformation create-stack --template-body file:///Users/haroldspencerjr/cfn-aws-nested-template.json --capabilities CAPABILITY_IAM --stack-name nestedbucketstackaws --profile tessai-group1
arn:aws:cloudformation::617513010345:stack/nestedbucketstackaws/2aa1648e-af4f-4fa9-bfcd-ef16ec848187

$ aws --endpoint-url http://cloudformation.h-12.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com:8773/ cloudformation describe-stacks --profile hspencer-group1
STACKS	2014-12-23T16:39:27.159Z	False	2014-12-23T16:39:29.735Z	arn:aws:cloudformation::617513010345:stack/nestedbucketstackaws/2aa1648e-af4f-4fa9-bfcd-ef16ec848187	nestedbucketstackaws	CREATE_FAILED	The following resource(s) failed to create: [myStack].
CAPABILITIES	CAPABILITY_IAM

$ aws --endpoint-url http://cloudformation.h-12.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com:8773/ cloudformation describe-stack-events --stack-name nestedbucketstackaws --profile hspencer-group1
STACKEVENTS	aec7c026-822e-4ca6-abf8-80a618aba63b	nestedbucketstackaws	arn:aws:cloudformation::617513010345:stack/nestedbucketstackaws/2aa1648e-af4f-4fa9-bfcd-ef16ec848187	{}	ROLLBACK_IN_PROGRESS	Create stack failed.  Rollback requested by user.	AWS::CloudFormation::Stack	arn:aws:cloudformation::617513010345:stack/nestedbucketstackaws/2aa1648e-af4f-4fa9-bfcd-ef16ec848187	nestedbucketstackaws	2014-12-23T16:40:06.258Z
STACKEVENTS	fcd98a64-a16b-4649-a1db-d37e681a3e61	nestedbucketstackaws	arn:aws:cloudformation::617513010345:stack/nestedbucketstackaws/2aa1648e-af4f-4fa9-bfcd-ef16ec848187	{}	CREATE_FAILED	The following resource(s) failed to create: [myStack].	AWS::CloudFormation::Stack	arn:aws:cloudformation::617513010345:stack/nestedbucketstackaws/2aa1648e-af4f-4fa9-bfcd-ef16ec848187	nestedbucketstackaws	2014-12-23T16:39:29.720Z
STACKEVENTS	myStack-CREATE_FAILED-1419352768830	myStack		{"TemplateURL":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/cloudformation-templates-us-east-1/S3_Bucket.template","TimeoutInMinutes":"60"}	CREATE_FAILED	Stack name nestedbucketstackaws-myStack-SGYX22CBA3WO2 must be alphanumeric and start with a letter.	AWS::CloudFormation::Stack	arn:aws:cloudformation::617513010345:stack/nestedbucketstackaws/2aa1648e-af4f-4fa9-bfcd-ef16ec848187	nestedbucketstackaws	2014-12-23T16:39:28.830Z
STACKEVENTS	myStack-CREATE_IN_PROGRESS-1419352768290	myStack		{"TemplateURL":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/cloudformation-templates-us-east-1/S3_Bucket.template","TimeoutInMinutes":"60"}	CREATE_IN_PROGRESS		AWS::CloudFormation::Stack	arn:aws:cloudformation::617513010345:stack/nestedbucketstackaws/2aa1648e-af4f-4fa9-bfcd-ef16ec848187	nestedbucketstackaws	2014-12-23T16:39:28.290Z
STACKEVENTS	d413ceb8-408e-4e53-b253-38b17c7614e0	nestedbucketstackaws	arn:aws:cloudformation::617513010345:stack/nestedbucketstackaws/2aa1648e-af4f-4fa9-bfcd-ef16ec848187	{}	CREATE_IN_PROGRESS	User Initiated	AWS::CloudFormation::Stack	arn:aws:cloudformation::617513010345:stack/nestedbucketstackaws/2aa1648e-af4f-4fa9-bfcd-ef16ec848187	nestedbucketstackaws	2014-12-23T16:39:27.561Z
{code}
Getting back to InQA state. This should not have been rejected.
Unable to verify due to EUCA-10237.

[~viglesias]/[~tony],

Verified this issue is fixed on updated [Group #2 cloud|https://eucalyptus.atlassian.net/wiki/display/QA/Euca+4.1+Quality+Dashboard#Euca4.1QualityDashboard-TypeofDeployments] using AWS CLI tools.

*Steps*

# Created template and placed on S3 bucket with 'public-read' ACL - https://s3.amazonaws.com/euca10018/cfn-vpc-template.json
# Applied following IAM access policy to non-admin user:
{code}
# euare-grouplistpolicies -g Developers --region admin-hspencer2@group2 -v
cfn-euca10018
{
  "Statement": [
    {
      "Sid": "Stmt1419017169361",
      "Action": [
        "cloudformation:CreateStack",
        "cloudformation:DescribeStacks",
        "cloudformation:GetTemplate",
        "cloudformation:DeleteStack",
        "cloudformation:DescribeStackEvents",
        "cloudformation:DescribeStackResource",
        "cloudformation:DescribeStackResources",
        "cloudformation:ValidateTemplate",
        "cloudformation:ListStacks"
      ],
      "Effect": "Allow",
      "Resource": "*"
    },
    {
      "Sid": "Stmt1419017345024",
      "Action": [
        "ec2:AuthorizeSecurityGroupEgress",
        "ec2:AuthorizeSecurityGroupIngress",
        "ec2:CreateKeyPair",
        "ec2:CreateTags",
        "ec2:DeleteTags",
        "ec2:CreateSecurityGroup",
        "ec2:DescribeInstances",
        "ec2:DescribeKeyPairs",
        "ec2:DescribeSecurityGroups",
        "ec2:CreateVpc",
        "ec2:ModifyVpcAttribute",
        "ec2:DescribeVpcs",
        "ec2:DeleteVpc",
        "ec2:CreateSubnet",
        "ec2:DeleteSubnet",
        "ec2:DeleteSecurityGroup",
        "ec2:CreateRouteTable",
        "ec2:CreateRoute",
        "ec2:DeleteRouteTable",
        "ec2:DeleteRoute",
        "ec2:AllocateAddress",
        "ec2:AssociateAddress",
        "ec2:AssociateRouteTable",
        "ec2:AttachInternetGateway",
        "ec2:AttachNetworkInterface",
        "ec2:CreateInternetGateway",
        "ec2:CreateNetworkAcl",
        "ec2:CreateNetworkAclEntry",
        "ec2:CreateNetworkInterface",
        "ec2:DeleteInternetGateway",
        "ec2:DeleteNetworkAcl",
        "ec2:DeleteNetworkAclEntry",
        "ec2:DeleteNetworkInterface",
        "ec2:DescribeAddresses",
        "ec2:DescribeInternetGateways",
        "ec2:DescribeNetworkAcls",
        "ec2:DescribeNetworkInterfaceAttribute",
        "ec2:DescribeNetworkInterfaces",
        "ec2:DescribeRouteTables",
        "ec2:DescribeSubnets",
        "ec2:DetachInternetGateway",
        "ec2:DetachNetworkInterface",
        "ec2:DisassociateAddress",
        "ec2:DisassociateRouteTable",
        "ec2:ModifyNetworkInterfaceAttribute",
        "ec2:ModifyVpcAttribute",
        "ec2:ReleaseAddress",
        "ec2:ReplaceNetworkAclAssociation",
        "ec2:ReplaceNetworkAclEntry",
        "ec2:ReplaceRoute",
        "ec2:ReplaceRouteTableAssociation",
        "ec2:ResetNetworkInterfaceAttribute",
        "ec2:RevokeSecurityGroupEgress",
        "ec2:RevokeSecurityGroupIngress",
        "ec2:TerminateInstances",
        "ec2:RunInstances"
      ],
      "Effect": "Allow",
      "Resource": "*"
    }
  ]
}
{code}
# Launched nested stack using the following template:
{code}
$ cat cfn-vpc-nested-template.json
{
    "AWSTemplateFormatVersion" : "2010-09-09",
    "Description" : "Cloudformation Example => Nested Stack that pulls CF template from S3 URL",
    "Resources" : {
        "vpcStack" : {
           "Type" : "AWS::CloudFormation::Stack",
           "Properties" : {
              "TemplateURL" : "https://s3.amazonaws.com/euca10018/cfn-vpc-template.json",
              "TimeoutInMinutes" : "60"
           }
        }
    },
    "Outputs": {
       "StackRef": {"Value": { "Ref" : "vpcStack"}}
    }
}
{code}
{code}
$ aws --endpoint-url http://cloudformation.c-06.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com:8773/ cloudformation create-stack --template-body file:///Users/haroldspencerjr/cfn-vpc-nested-template.json --stack-name NestedVPCStack --capabilities CAPABILITY_IAM --profile rickross-group2
arn:aws:cloudformation::804704720152:stack/NestedVPCStack/8bcc65dd-95c2-452a-a316-93d12a7cbffa
{code}
# Stack completed successfully:
{code}
$ aws --endpoint-url http://cloudformation.c-06.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com:8773/ cloudformation describe-stacks --profile rickross-group2
STACKS	2014-12-23T22:41:32.088Z	Cloudformation Example => Nested Stack that pulls CF template from S3 URL	False	2014-12-23T22:43:17.502Z	arn:aws:cloudformation::804704720152:stack/NestedVPCStack/8bcc65dd-95c2-452a-a316-93d12a7cbffa	NestedVPCStack	CREATE_COMPLETE	Complete!
CAPABILITIES	CAPABILITY_IAM
OUTPUTS	StackRef	arn:aws:cloudformation::804704720152:stack/NestedVPCStack-vpcStack-WWHS2JHKHQYEV/5b030a41-3848-4200-89b7-5ef79d5e05ee
STACKS	2014-12-23T22:41:33.974Z	Cloudformation generated by VisualOps	True	2014-12-23T22:43:05.526Z	arn:aws:cloudformation::804704720152:stack/NestedVPCStack-vpcStack-WWHS2JHKHQYEV/5b030a41-3848-4200-89b7-5ef79d5e05ee	NestedVPCStack-vpcStack-WWHS2JHKHQYEV	CREATE_COMPLETE	Complete!
CAPABILITIES	CAPABILITY_IAM
{code}
